title: Mapping GitHub Commits with Atlas
description: A step-by-step guide to visualizing GitHub commit histories using Nomic Atlas.

overview.purpose: To automate the extraction, processing, and visualization of GitHub commit histories for data analysis.
use_cases: Identifying key contributors and their impact.

prerequisites: A GitHub repository with sufficient commit history.
Access to GitHub's API via a personal access token (PAT).
A valid Nomic Atlas API key.

steps.title: Extract Commit Data from GitHub
steps.description: Use the GitHub API to fetch commit history data from a repository.

example_request.python_code:
import requests

url = 'https://api.github.com/repos/<owner>/<repo>/commits'
headers = {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer <GITHUB_TOKEN>'
}

data = response.json()
print(data)

python_script.description: Automate the entire process using Python.
python_script.code:
import requests

# Step 1: Fetch commit data from GitHub
url = 'https://api.github.com/repos/<owner>/<repo>/commits'
headers = {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer <GITHUB_TOKEN>'
}
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
commit_data = response.json()

# Step 2: Format data for Atlas
formatted_data = [
    {
        'commit_hash': commit['sha'],
        'author': commit['commit']['author']['name'],
        'date': commit['commit']['author']['date'],
        'message': commit['commit']['message']
    } for commit in commit_data
]

# Step 3: Upload data to Atlas
upload_url = 'https://api-atlas.nomic.ai/v1/data/upload'
upload_headers = {
    'Authorization': 'Bearer <API_KEY>',
    'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.post(upload_url, headers=upload_headers, json={'data': formatted_data})

# Step 4: Create a map visualization
map_url = 'https://api-atlas.nomic.ai/v1/maps/create'
map_payload = {
    'name': 'GitHub Commits Map',
    'data': formatted_data
}
response = requests.post(map_url, headers=upload_headers, json=map_payload)
print(response.json())

notes: Ensure you have appropriate permissions to access the GitHub repository.
Data formatting is crucial for successful visualization in Nomic Atlas.
Refer to the Nomic Atlas API documentation for detailed parameter requirements.
